extension.description: Multi-emulator front-end for Kodi scalable to collections of thousands of ROMs. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROM sets and also supports scrapping ROM metadata and artwork online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro XML DATs. Launching of games and standalone applications is also available.

extension.summary: Lancer n'importer quelle application depuis Kodi.
extension.description: Advanced Launcher erlaubt das Starten beliebiger Linux, Windows und OS X Anwendungen (mit oder ohne Kommandozeile) direkt aus der Kodi Oberfläche. Advanced Launcher erlaubt weiterhin das Editieren, Herunterladen und Verwalten der Metadaten (Informationen und Bilder) für diese Anwendungen aus dem Internet.

Advanced Launcher allows you to start any Linux, Windows and OS X applications (with command line support or not) directly from the Kodi GUI. Advanced Launcher also give you the possibility to edit, download (from Internet resources) and manage all the meta-data (informations and images) related to these applications.

Advanced Launcher permet de lancer toutes les applications Linux, Windows and OS X (avec support des lignes de commandes ou non) directement depuis l'interface de Kodi. Advanced Launcher offre également la possibilité de modifier, télécharger (depuis les ressoures web) et de gérer toues les meta-donées (informations et images) relatives à ces applications.
Advanced Launcherilla voit käynnistää Kodi:n käyttöliittymästä mitä tahansa sovelluksia. Käynnistettävistä sovelluksista voi hakea tietoja ja kuvia Internet-tietokannoista.
Browse and launch all your Steam games from XBMC. Games are automatically added using your library contents. Fanart and images are added for games where available.
extension.disclaimer:
You will need Steam installed and an active web connection to launch games. Currently only supports Windows, however Linux and OS X support should be available soon.
The "VALVe Logo", Valve and Steam are trademarks of Valve Corporation.

extension.description: This is the official Repository of the german Community 'Kodinerds' which you'll find at www.kodinerds.net. Most of the hosted Addons are supported by the members of the Community. Enjoy!

Das ist das offizielle Repository der deutschen Community 'Kodinerds', welche Du unter www.kodinerds.net findest. Die meisten der hier gehosteten Addons werden von den Mitgliedern der Community aktiv supported. Viel Spaß!

Dies ist das offizielle xStream Addon-Verzeichnis.[CR]Bei der Bereitstellung einer neuen Version von xStream wird diese auf Funktionalität geprüft. Sollten dennoch Probleme auftreten benachrichtige bitte das offizielle xStream-Team.
extension.disclaimer: Die dargestellten Inhalte des in diesem Verzeichnis enthaltenen Addons werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
extension.description: Download and install xStream from the Official xStream Addon-Repository.[CR]Before a new version of xStream is provided to this repository the addon was checked for functionality. Please informs the official xStream-Team if you should have problems anyway.
extension.disclaimer: The creators of the addon in this repository do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by the addon nor do they have any affiliation with the content providers.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Install add-ons from the SuperRepo All Repository
Installeer add-ons uit de SuperRepo All Repository
Inštalácia add-ons zo SuperRepo All Repozitár
Installation von Addons aus dem SuperRepo All Repository
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
extension.description: Download and install add-ons for Kodi in the category "All" using SuperRepo.[CR][CR]By using SuperRepo repositories you will be able to take advantage of our serverside dependency checking, extensive file mirror service and many more.[CR]Visit our website at https://superrepo.org/ to browse the add-ons, create personal addon bundles and install whole bundles at once![CR][CR]

Download and installeer add-ons voor Kodi in de categorie "All" via SuperRepo.[CR]Door SuperRepo te installeren kunt u profiteren van onze controle van add-ons en ons uitgebreide server netwerk. Bezoek onze website op https://superrepo.org om door de add-ons te bladeren, persoonlijke add-on bundels te maken en complete bundels in 1 keer te installeren![CR][CR]

Preber a inštaluj add-ons do kategórie "All" z SuperRepo.org add-on repozitár.[CR][CR]Ak si našiel add-on ktorý je poškodený alebo nefunkčný, alebo chceš pridať nový add-on, potom prosím pozri na https://superrepo.org/[CR][CR]Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá add-ons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito add-ons.[CR][CR]Rozšírený repozitár vyvinul Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Lade und installiere Addons der Kategorie "All" aus dem SuperRepo.org Addon Repository.[CR][CR]Möchtest du ein fehlerhaftes Addon melden oder ein neues Addon vorschlagen, kannst du dies über unsere Webseite http://superrepo.org tun.[CR][CR]Das Repository wird mit Hilfe des SuperRepo Wiki durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für diesen Service.[CR][CR]Der"eXtended Reposity Generator" wird durch Bart Otten entwickelt.[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR] [CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR][CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]
extension.disclaimer: The SuperRepo generator fetches addons from multiple sources. Therefore SuperRepo accepts no responsibility for included addons.[CR]
De SuperRepo generator verzamelt addons van verschillende bronnen. Daarom accepteert SuperRepo geen enkele verantwoordelijkheid voor de ingevoegde addons.[CR]

Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá addons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito addons.[CR]

Das Repository wird durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für die enthaltenen Addons.[CR]
O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]
O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]
